attributes.action: Stop taking people's houses to pay for care!
attributes.additional_details: Care in Britain should not be charged for just because in later life you develop an incurable terminal disease such as Alzheimer's or Dimentia, especially when that person has already paid their taxes and P.A.Y.E through their working lives.
attributes.background: Stop taking people's assets they have worked hard for all their life to pay for terminal incurable diseases.
